Tue, 10 Dec 2024 01:00:32 +0000 Police said burglars broke into Ōtara Community Preschool and shattered windows, damaged the building and stole numerous items. Photo / Police
East Coast farmers face destocking without substantial rain https://www.nzherald.co.nz/gisborne-herald/news/east-coast-farmers-face-destocking-without-substantial-rain/K5YBG2UDG5FENAFCXFX6YJMDWI/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/gisborne-herald/news/east-coast-farmers-face-destocking-without-substantial-rain/K5YBG2UDG5FENAFCXFX6YJMDWI/ Murray RobertsonThe east coast needs decent rain soon to stave off the threat of drought. Tue, 10 Dec 2024 00:57:54 +0000 Main image: A 2017 picture of dry pasture in a paddock at Pouawa. Decent rain is needed soon to stave off scenes like this. Inset: Agfirst consultant Peter Andrew (left), and Federated Farmers Wairoa-Gisborne provincial president Charlie Reynolds.
